headline.main: War-Guilt Cases Now in Petain's Hands; He May Take Action to Avoid Open Trials

lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, Oct. 14 -- Concrete proposals for dealing with the cases of General Maurice Gustave Gamelin, former Premiers Leon Blum and Edouard Daladier and the others accused of responsibility for France's defeat were submitted tonight to Marshal Henri Philippe Petain by the new Council of Political Justice.
abstract: Petain gets proposals; open trial considered difficult
